channel.title: Mjpg Streamer on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Mjpg Streamer on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Raspberry Pi camera board video streaming
item.description: Raspberry Pi camera board So you got your Raspberry Pi and decided to get a Camera Board to do something awesome with it. Why not turn it a simple video streamer? That’s what I thought too. I wanted to set up a simple security camera for my home so that I can see spy on whoever is lurking around from wherever I am through a web browser.
